subject: Re: [junit] Timing individual Test Methods, and Test Classes
msgSnippet: ... Ant s junit-report shows the execution time of each test, but not each test case class. -- J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger :: http://www.jbrains.info Your guide to
messageBody:
Kamal Ahmed wrote:

> Does JUnit provide some way of timing "individual Test Methods, and Test
> Classes?"

Ant's junit-report shows the execution time of each test, but not each
test case class.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger :: http://www.jbrains.info
Your guide to software craftsmanship
JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
2005 Gordon Pask Award for contribution Agile Software Practice
